1471310.name: 长途客车模拟 - 巴伐利亚城堡
1471310.description:
This free DLC will add the famous and romantic 19th-century bavarian castle to the world of Fernbus Simulator in the South of Germany. The picturesque Alps in the background and the Allgäu stretching towards the horizon in front it. Commissioned by King Ludwig II of Bavaria the castle is nowadays open to the public and attracts many thousands of visitors per day from all around the world.



  • True to original reconstruction of the castle
  • Detailed decorations of the castle's surroundings
  • Marienbrücke (Marie's Bridge) and its memorable point of view of the castle
  • FlixBus and shuttle bus stops in the town of Hohenschwangau
  • New connection between Germany and Austria: Highway A7
1471310.supported_languages:
英语, 德语*, 法语, 波兰语, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 土耳其语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 匈牙利语, 瑞典语, 日语, 简体中文, 芬兰语, 荷兰语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
